item.title: Report X-2024010556
item.description:
Report X-2024010556

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THAT THE INTERNAL BOXES WERE MARKED WITH CORROSIVE PICTOGRAM. THE LABEL SAID THE PRODUCT CONTAINED PHOSPHORIC ACID. IT TESTED AS A 0 ON THE PH SCALE. THERE WERE NO MARKINGS OF ANY KIND ON THE OUTER BOX. UNDECLARED HAZMAT DISCOVERED. HMSC CONFIRMED. UNDECLARED PROTOCOL WAS FOLLOWED.
